newsitem.title: USA: Interleaf seeks funds for ongoing operation.
newsitem.headline: Interleaf seeks funds for ongoing operation.

text.p: Interleaf Inc, noting its cash has declined significantly during the quarter, said it is negotiating with its lender to provide additional financing needed to fund ongoing operations.
The company said it also retained Hambrecht and Quist to assist in seeking further debt or equity financing and to explore strategic alternatives.
Interleaf also said it expects revenue of about $17 million and a significant operating loss for its second quarter ending September 30.
The company said its revenue amount is a preliminary estimate as the quarter is not ended.
Interleaf said there is no assurance that additional financing can be obtained.
The company reported a $0.22 per share loss in the first quarter on total revenues of $19 million. First Call estimates for the second quarter were unavailable.
